p: Santoro et al. explored the impact of the essential oil obtained from Origanum vulgare L. (harvested from Lavras, Brazil) on development and ultrastructure of Trypanosoma cruzi. Within 24 h incubation with OEO (from 25 to 250 μg/mL), the epimastigotes and trypomastigotes presented lysis of the cells and the IC 50 values were 115μg/mL for trypomastigotes and 175 μg/mL for epimastigotes. Moreover, the examination of oregano-treated parasites (115 μg/mL) assessed by TEM showed slight morphological alterations in the plasma and flagellar membrane [ 55].
